channel.title: Maccy
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.description:
• Added Belarusian translation.
  • Added separator line between pinned and unpinned items.
  • Added scrolling support for large texts in preview popover.
  • Added preview for HEIC image files.
  • Improved performance for large text copies.
  • Improved handling of hovered items.
  • Fixed paste + paste without formatting combination.
  • Fixed issue when file URLs were removed when pasting without formatting.
  • Fixed the issue when the first pinned item was not pre-selected and there were no unpinned items.
